description: A nullDC ALL-IN-ONE Launcher and optimizer to ensure easy setup for nullDC(Naomi/Atomidwave/Dreamcast), Mednafen(NES/SNES/Genesis/MegaDrive/GBA/GBC/Neo-Geo Pocket/PSX/Saturn/Famicom Disk Drive) and optimized settings for a smooth gameplay experiance. Easy setup easy connection, minimal effort maximum performance.
